member.name: D3D12_GPU_VIRTUAL_ADDRESS_RANGE_AND_STRIDE
member.summary: Represents a GPU virtual address range and stride.

member.name: D3D12_GPU_VIRTUAL_ADDRESS_RANGE_AND_STRIDE.StartAddress
member.summary: The beginning of the virtual address range.

member.name: D3D12_GPU_VIRTUAL_ADDRESS_RANGE_AND_STRIDE.SizeInBytes
member.summary: The size of the virtual address range, in bytes.

member.name: D3D12_GPU_VIRTUAL_ADDRESS_RANGE_AND_STRIDE.StrideInBytes
member.summary: Defines the record-indexing stride within the memory range.
